00010 #include "Jamoma.h"
00011 
00012 
00013 // Data Structure for this object
00014 typedef struct _remote{
00015         t_jcom_core_subscriber_common   common;
00016         void                                                    *outlet;
00017         void                                                    *dumpout;       
00018         t_atom                                                  output[512];    // buffer that gets sent to the hub
00019         short                                                   output_len;
00020 } t_remote;
00021 
00022 
00023 // Prototypes for methods
00024 void *remote_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv);                 // New Object Creation Method
00025 void remote_assist(t_remote *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);              // Assistance Method
00026 void remote_dispatched(t_remote *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00027 void remote_jit_matrix(t_remote *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00028 void remote_send_feedback(t_remote *x);
00029 void remote_int(t_remote *x, long value);
00030 void remote_float(t_remote *x, double value);
00031 void remote_symbol(t_remote *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00032 void remote_list(t_remote *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00033 
00034 
00035 // Globals
00036 t_class         *remote_class;                                  // Required. Global pointing to this class
00037 
00038 
00039 /************************************************************************************/
00040 // Main() Function
00041 
00042 int main(void)                          // main recieves a copy of the Max function macros table
00043 {
00044         t_class         *c;
00045         t_object        *attr;
00046         long            offset;
00047         
00048         jamoma_init();
00049 
00050         // Define our class
00051         c = class_new("jcom.remote",(method)remote_new, (method)jcom_core_subscriber_common_free, 
00052                 (short)sizeof(t_remote), (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00053         offset = calcoffset(t_remote, common);
00054         class_obexoffset_set(c, offset + calcoffset(t_jcom_core_subscriber_common, obex));
00055 
00056         // Make methods accessible for our class: 
00057         class_addmethod(c, (method)remote_dispatched,           "dispatched",   A_GIMME, 0L);
00058         class_addmethod(c, (method)remote_jit_matrix,           "jit_matrix",   A_GIMME, 0L);
00059         class_addmethod(c, (method)remote_int,                          "int",                  A_DEFLONG,      0L);
00060         class_addmethod(c, (method)remote_float,                        "float",                A_DEFFLOAT,     0L);
00061         class_addmethod(c, (method)remote_list,                         "list",                 A_GIMME, 0L);
00062         class_addmethod(c, (method)remote_symbol,                       "anything",             A_GIMME, 0L);
00063     class_addmethod(c, (method)remote_assist,                   "assist",               A_CANT, 0L);
00064 
00065         jcom_core_subscriber_classinit_common(c, attr, offset); 
00066                 
00067         // Finalize our class
00068         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00069         remote_class = c;
00070 
00071         return 0;
00072 }
00073 
00074 
00075 /************************************************************************************/
00076 // Object Life
00077 
00078 // Create
00079 void *remote_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00080 {
00081         long            attrstart = attr_args_offset(argc, argv);               // support normal arguments
00082         t_remote        *x = (t_remote *)object_alloc(remote_class);
00083         t_symbol        *name = _sym_nothing;   
00084         
00085         if(attrstart && argv)
00086                 atom_arg_getsym(&name, 0, attrstart, argv);
00087         else
00088                 name = symbol_unique();
00089         
00090         if(x){
00091                 x->dumpout = outlet_new(x, NULL);
00092                 x->outlet = outlet_new(x, NULL);
00093                 object_obex_store((void *)x, ps_dumpout, (object *)x->dumpout);         // setup the dumpout
00094 
00095                 atom_setsym(&x->output[0], name);
00096                 x->output_len = 1;
00097 
00098                 jcom_core_subscriber_new_common(&x->common, name, ps_subscribe_remote);
00099                 attr_args_process(x, argc, argv);                                       // handle attribute args                                
00100                 defer_low(x, (method)jcom_core_subscriber_subscribe, 0, 0, 0);
00101         }
00102         return (x);                                                                                             // Return the pointer
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 /************************************************************************************/
00107 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00108 
00109 // Method for Assistance Messages
00110 void remote_assist(t_remote *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00111 {
00112         if(msg==1)      // Inlets
00113                 strcpy(dst, "private messages to send to the hub");
00114         else if(msg==2){ // Outlets
00115                 if(arg == 0) strcpy(dst, "private messages from the hub");
00116                 else strcpy(dst, "dumpout");
00117         }
00118 }
00119 
00120 
00121 // messages received from jcom.hub
00122 void remote_dispatched(t_remote *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00123 {
00124         outlet_anything(x->outlet, atom_getsym(argv), argc-1, argv+1);
00125 }
00126 
00127 
00128 // messages received from jcom.out
00129 void remote_jit_matrix(t_remote *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00130 {
00131         outlet_anything(x->outlet, msg, argc, argv);
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00135 // remote values to the hub
00136 void remote_send_private(t_remote *x)
00137 {
00138         object_method_typed(x->common.hub, ps_private, x->output_len, x->output, NULL);
00139         x->output_len = 1;      // truncate to just the name of this jcom.remote object
00140 }
00141 
00142 
00143 // INT INPUT
00144 void remote_int(t_remote *x, long value)
00145 {
00146         atom_setlong(&x->output[1], value);
00147         x->output_len = 2;
00148         remote_send_private(x);
00149 }
00150 
00151 
00152 // FLOAT INPUT
00153 void remote_float(t_remote *x, double value)
00154 {
00155         atom_setfloat(&x->output[1], value);
00156         x->output_len = 2;
00157         remote_send_private(x);
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00161 // SYMBOL INPUT
00162 void remote_symbol(t_remote *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00163 {
00164         short i;
00165 
00166         atom_setsym(&x->output[1], msg);
00167         x->output_len++;
00168         
00169         for(i=1; i<=argc; i++){
00170                 jcom_core_atom_copy(&x->output[i+1], argv++);
00171                 x->output_len++;
00172         }       
00173         
00174         remote_send_private(x);
00175 }
00176 
00177 
00178 // LIST INPUT 
00179 void remote_list(t_remote *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00180 {
00181         short i;
00182         
00183         for(i=1; i<=argc; i++){
00184                 jcom_core_atom_copy(&x->output[i], argv++);
00185                 x->output_len++;
00186         }
00187         remote_send_private(x);
00188 }
